segment.source: Author a Custom Recording Profile
segment.target: Author a Custom Recording Profile

segment.source: Author a Custom Recording Profile
segment.target: Author a Custom Recording Profile

segment.source: Author a Custom Recording Profile
segment.target: Author a Custom Recording Profile

segment.source: This procedure describes how to author a custom recording profile in Windows Performance Recorder (WPR).
segment.target: This procedure describes how to author a custom recording profile in Windows Performance Recorder (WPR).

segment.source: You can author custom profiles in an XML file that has a .wprp extension.
segment.target: You can author custom profiles in an XML file that has a .wprp extension.

segment.source: are available See Recording Profile XML Reference for the complete schema and reference information.
segment.target: are available See Recording Profile XML Reference for the complete schema and reference information.

segment.source: are available See Authoring Recording Profiles for more detailed information about authoring recording profiles.
segment.target: are available See Authoring Recording Profiles for more detailed information about authoring recording profiles.

segment.source: To author a custom recording profile
segment.target: To author a custom recording profile

segment.source: In an XML editor, create a new XML file.
segment.target: In an XML editor, create a new XML file.

segment.source: Enter collector definitions.
segment.target: Enter collector definitions.

segment.source: For more information, see 1. Collector Definitions.
segment.target: For more information, see 1. Collector Definitions.

segment.source: Enter system and event provider definitions.
segment.target: Enter system and event provider definitions.

segment.source: For more information, see 2. System and Event Provider Definitions.
segment.target: For more information, see 2. System and Event Provider Definitions.

segment.source: Enter profile definitions.
segment.target: Enter profile definitions.

segment.source: For more information, see 3. Profile Definitions.
segment.target: For more information, see 3. Profile Definitions.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you want the custom profile to stop and roll back if some providers do not start, set the Strict attribute to "true".
segment.target: If you want the custom profile to stop and roll back if some providers do not start, set the Strict attribute to "true".

segment.source: For more information about this option, see Strict Providers.
segment.target: For more information about this option, see Strict Providers.

segment.source: Save the file with a .wprp extension.
segment.target: Save the file with a .wprp extension.

segment.source: You can define derived collectors, providers, and profiles that inherit from a base version that you define earlier in the same file or in another file.
segment.target: You can define derived collectors, providers, and profiles that inherit from a base version that you define earlier in the same file or in another file.

segment.source: For more information about this option, see Inheritance.
segment.target: For more information about this option, see Inheritance.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: WPR Common Scenarios
